name: io.cordova.hellocordova
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.start: npx nodemon --watch plugins/cordova-plugin-file --watch www --exec "cordova run electron --nobuild" --ext js
scripts.test: npx nodemon --watch www --exec "cordova prepare electron && cordova run electron --nobuild" --ext html,css,js

author: Apache Cordova Team
